00054         PixelFormat convertPixelFormat(uint32 rgbBits, uint32 rMask, 
00055             uint32 gMask, uint32 bMask, uint32 aMask) const;

00062         void unpackDXTAlpha(const DXTInterpolatedAlphaBlock& block, ColourValue* pCol) const;
